Package it.polimi.ingsw.Network

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Network.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientHandler extends Object implements Runnable
This class handles the server's connection with a single client.
